cleaned_text: A holistic approach to wellness Empowering health through personalized care. Empowering health through personalized care. As licensed naturopathic practitioners, we work with a variety of conditions and offer a full range of wellness services, below are some of the most common services we provide and conditions we see. Integrative Care Fecal Microbiota Transplants (FMT) GI Health + Microbiome Restoration Hormone Management Therapeutic Nutrition Stress Management Herbal Medicine + Homeopathy Helminthic Therapy Counseling Supplement Recommendations Functional Lab Review Clostridium difficile infection + post infectious IBS Digestive issues: indigestion, acid reflux, diarrhea, constipation, irritable bowel syndrome, rheumatic orthostatic tachycardia syndrome (POTS) etc. Allergies, MCAS, + food and environmental sensitivities Women's + men's health and hormones Blood sugar disorders: diabetes, metabolic syndrome, etc. Anxiety + depression Autism spectrum disorder Pediatrics Acute infections: cold, flu, sore throat, UTI, female infections, etc Fecal Microbiota Transplant (FMT), is the transplant of an entire colonic microbiome from a healthy donor to a recipient with the goal of eliminating microbial imbalances that promote disease. In other words, we take stool from a very healthy person and we deliver it via oral capsules to treat disease. It is at least 95% effective for the treatment of antibiotic resistant Clostridium difficile infections. It is currently being studied to improve quality of life and treat autism spectrum disorder, ulcerative colitis, Crohn's disease, Parkinson's disease, Alzheimer's disease, SIBO, IBS, allergies, arthritis, cancer, multiple sclerosis, liver disease, depression, bipolar disorder, metabolic disease, diabetes, obesity, antibiotic resistant infections, and pouchitis. Dr. Mollie is currently accepting new recurrent C. difficile patients for treatment with oral FMT capsules and has been successfully treating this disease with oral FMT since 2015.
